publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5551 Mr Tom McCabe: Budget (Scotland) (No.4) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Budget (Scotland) (No.4) Bill be passed. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*, Mr Jack McConnell*, George Lyon*, Nicol Stephen*

S2M-5551 Mr Tom McCabe: Budget (Scotland) (No.4) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Budget (Scotland) (No.4) Bill be passed. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran, Mr Jack McConnell, George Lyon, Nicol Stephen
